oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Edward Roche Certificate for the Society of Cincinnati signed by George Washington, 1787
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Edward Roche certificate for the Society of Cincinnati signed by George Washington, 1787.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Revolutionaries; Documents; Certificates
United States--History--Revolution, 1775-1783; Roche, Edward, 1754-1821
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Society of the Cincinnati is the oldest hereditary/patriotic organization in the United States. Its members are direct descendants of Continental Army and Navy officers and French officers who served in the American Revolution.
